title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Rush is back with a baseball-inspired update on his cancer treatment. Supremes vote 9-0 to slap down left's attempt to manipulate Electoral College voters. Support the Electoral College and marvel at the foresight of your founding fathers. MAGA at Rushmore and White House exposes the left's hatred. COVID hype is aimed at another shutdown. Most of what you see in the media just isn't true.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Two generations don't know about American history -- because leftists have trained them to hate the country. Democrats want to abolish the Electoral College to cement their totalitarian control. Caller: If you don’t need the cops, show us peace.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Limbaugh accuracy audit finds 99.8% rating unchanged, and our models are far more accurate than those used for coronavirus. COVID-19 deaths hit an all-time low. No in-person classes at Harvard, but don’t look for a discount. Dershowitz hasn't been spotted at his usual nude beach since Epstein madam capture. You don’t have to live where you work, and that's a risk for Democrats. Tucker '24? If Kanye West runs, it'll cripple Biden. Changing the Redskins and Indians isn't gonna bring magic happiness. NBA agrees to allow "social justice messages" on jerseys. The people who hate Trump need to be defeated, not reached out to!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
